guarantees.coreStability: Core modules will remain stable and compatible for all 1.x releases.
guarantees.backwardsCompatibility: No breaking changes to public interfaces within the 1.x lifecycle.
guarantees.manifestIntegrity: All manifests and seals must remain present, readable, and valid.
guarantees.telemetryContinuity: Telemetry format and files will remain consistent across updates.
guarantees.governanceValidity: Governance rules must remain enforceable and compatible across 1.x.
guarantees.auditPreservation: Audit logs and seal history must be preserved during upgrades.

upgradePolicy.allowed: Minor and patch releases may add functionality without breaking behaviour.
upgradePolicy.restricted: Major structural changes require a new major version.
upgradePolicy.prohibited: Removal of sealed phases or altering historical audit data.
